products.name: TWICE Formula of Love: O+T=<3
products.description: TWICE's 2021 album 'Formula of Love: O+T=<3' explores themes of love and self-discovery with catchy tracks like 'SCIENTIST' and 'Love is a Science' that showcase their signature pop sound.
products.excerpt: TWICE's 2021 album featuring 'SCIENTIST'.

products.name: aespa Savage
products.description: aespa's first mini album 'Savage' features a bold and innovative sound, characterized by the title track 'Next Level'. This album reflects the group's unique blend of pop and hip-hop influences.
products.excerpt: aespa's first mini album featuring 'Next Level'.

products.name: NMIXX Ad Mare
products.description: NMIXX's debut mini album 'Ad Mare' features a vibrant mix of styles and genres, with the title track 'O.O' showcasing their versatility and fresh sounds in the K-pop industry.
products.excerpt: NMIXX's debut album with the title track 'O.O'.

products.name: IVE LOVE DIVE
products.description: IVE's first single album 'LOVE DIVE' has a catchy song of the same name that captures the fresh and confident vibe of young love, making it an essential addition to any K-pop collection.
products.excerpt: IVE's single album featuring the hit 'LOVE DIVE'.

products.name: SEVENTEEN Face the Sun
products.description: SEVENTEEN's fourth studio album 'Face the Sun' combines various music styles and themes, featuring the powerful title track 'HOT'. This album showcases their growth and versatility as artists.
products.excerpt: SEVENTEEN's fourth album featuring 'HOT'.

products.name: BLACKPINK The Album
products.description: BLACKPINK's first full studio album 'The Album' features a unique blend of musical styles and popular tracks like 'How You Like That', showcasing their evolution as a group.
products.excerpt: BLACKPINK's debut full album featuring various hit tracks.

products.name: Red Velvet The ReVe Festival: Finale
products.description: Red Velvet's 'The ReVe Festival: Finale' rounds off the ReVe trilogy, featuring the hit single 'Psycho' and a collection of their best works, marking a significant moment in their career.
products.excerpt: Red Velvet's festival trilogy finale featuring 'Psycho'.

products.name: LE SSERAFIM Fearless
products.description: LE SSERAFIM's debut mini album 'Fearless' delivers a confident and vibrant sound, with the title track 'Fearless' expressing themes of empowerment and independence.
products.excerpt: LE SSERAFIM's debut album showcasing confidence.

products.name: BABYMONSTER Part 1
products.description: BABYMONSTER's first part of their official album showcases their fresh concepts and vibrant music styles, designed to appeal to both K-pop fans and new listeners.
products.excerpt: BABYMONSTER's first installment featuring fresh concepts.

products.name: BTS - Proof
products.description: BTS's anthology album 'Proof' features a collection of their greatest hits along with three new tracks. This album encapsulates their journey and evolution as artists.
products.excerpt: BTS's anthology album featuring their journey.

products.name: Stray Kids - NOEASY
products.description: Stray Kids' second studio album 'NOEASY' features energetic tracks including 'Thunderous' and showcases their powerful sound and impressive songwriting.
products.excerpt: Stray Kids' album featuring the hit 'Thunderous'.

products.name: NCT 127 - Sticker
products.description: NCT 127's third studio album 'Sticker' features a diverse range of genres with the title track 'Sticker' offering a catchy blend of pop sounds.
products.excerpt: NCT 127's album featuring the title track 'Sticker'.

products.name: GOT7 - Breath of Love: Last Piece
products.description: GOT7's special album 'Breath of Love: Last Piece' features melodies that resonate deeply. The title track 'Last Piece' expresses themes of love and longing.
products.excerpt: GOT7's special album featuring heartwarming songs.

products.name: TXT - The Chaos Chapter: FREEZE
products.description: TXT's album 'The Chaos Chapter: FREEZE' combines youthful themes with existential reflections. The title track '0X1=LOVESONG' features a unique sound that embodies their creative evolution.
products.excerpt: TXT's album highlighting their creative evolution.

products.name: ITZY - CRAZY IN LOVE
products.description: ITZY's first full album 'CRAZY IN LOVE' features energetic tracks like 'Loco', emphasizing their bold and confident style in K-Pop.
products.excerpt: ITZY's first full album featuring 'Loco'.

products.name: ATEEZ - ZERO: FEVER PART.3
products.description: ATEEZ's album 'ZERO: FEVER PART.3' continues their narrative of self-discovery and adventure, featuring powerful tracks that highlight their vocal and performance abilities.
products.excerpt: ATEEZ's album emphasizing themes of adventure and growth.

products.name: TWICE - Taste of Love
products.description: TWICE's 10th mini album 'Taste of Love' was released in 2021 and features the hit single 'Alcohol-Free'. The album showcases a bright and fresh summer sound with engaging melodies.
products.excerpt: TWICE's 10th mini album featuring 'Alcohol-Free'.

products.name: Red Velvet - The Perfect Red Velvet
products.description: Red Velvet's first compilation album, 'The Perfect Red Velvet', includes their greatest hits and iconic tracks such as 'Psycho' and 'Red Flavor'. This album celebrates their unique sound and versatility.
products.excerpt: Red Velvet's compilation album celebrating their hits.

products.name: aespa - Girls
products.description: aespa's first full album 'Girls' features a distinct mix of genres and the title track 'Girls'. This album solidifies their place in the K-Pop landscape with innovative sounds and themes.
products.excerpt: aespa's first full album featuring the title track 'Girls'.

products.name: Red Velvet - RBB (Revelbee)
products.description: Red Velvet's sixth mini album 'RBB (Revelbee)' features the title track 'RBB' and showcases their signature blend of vibrant pop and sultry R&B.
products.excerpt: Red Velvet's mini album featuring the smooth 'RBB'.

products.name: NewJeans - New Jeans
products.description: NewJeans' self-titled debut EP features a fresh sound that blends various genres, with the hit single 'Attention' showcasing their unique style and approach to K-Pop.
products.excerpt: NewJeans' debut album featuring the hit 'Attention'.

products.name: NewJeans - OMG
products.description: NewJeans' second EP 'OMG' features the popular title track 'OMG' alongside other catchy songs, continuing their trend of innovative concepts and refreshing melodies.
products.excerpt: NewJeans' EP featuring the hit 'OMG'.

products.name: NewJeans - Supernatural
products.description: NewJeans' latest EP 'Supernatural' showcases their captivating sound and fresh concepts. The EP includes the title track 'Supernatural' and other captivating songs.
products.excerpt: NewJeans' latest EP 'Supernatural'
